skill.name: scientific-schematics
skill.description: Create publication-quality scientific diagrams using Nano Banana Pro AI with smart iterative refinement. Uses Gemini 3 Pro for quality review. Only regenerates if quality is below threshold for your document type. Specialized in neural network architectures, system diagrams, flowcharts, biological pathways, and complex scientific visualizations.
skill.summary: Create publication-quality scientific diagrams using Nano Banana Pro AI with smart iterative refinem...
skill.author: K-Dense Inc.

security_audit.summary: Legitimate AI-powered scientific diagram generation tool. Makes controlled HTTP requests to OpenRouter API for image generation. Environment variable access is limited to API key authentication. Filesystem writes only to user-specified output paths. No malicious patterns detected.

content.value_statement: Creating publication-quality scientific diagrams requires specialized tools and significant time. This skill uses AI to generate neural network architectures, biological pathways, flowcharts, and system diagrams from natural language descriptions with automatic quality review.
actual_capabilities: Generate scientific diagrams from natural language descriptions
Create neural network architecture diagrams automatically
Produce biological pathway and signaling cascade illustrations
Build flowcharts for CONSORT, PRISMA, and study designs
Automatic quality review using Gemini 3 Pro with smart iteration
Export publication-ready images with version control
limitations: Requires OpenRouter API key for AI generation
Output format limited to PNG images
Diagram style determined by AI, limited customization options

use_cases.title: Publication figures
use_cases.description: Create journal-ready diagrams for papers, theses, and grant proposals with quality thresholds

use_cases.title: Architecture diagrams
use_cases.description: Generate neural network and system architecture diagrams for documentation and presentations

use_cases.title: Study flowcharts
use_cases.description: Build CONSORT and PRISMA flowcharts for dissertations and research projects

prompt_templates.title: Basic flowchart
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a flowchart showing process flow with decision points and outcomes

prompt_templates.title: Neural network
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate a neural network architecture diagram with input, hidden, and output layers

prompt_templates.title: Biological pathway
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a biological signaling pathway diagram with receptors, kinases, and transcription factors

prompt_templates.title: System architecture
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate a technical system architecture diagram showing components and data flow

output_examples.input: Generate a Transformer encoder-decoder architecture diagram for a journal paper

best_practices: Specify document type (journal, poster, presentation) to apply appropriate quality thresholds
Include specific components, flow direction, and labels in your description
Use iterative refinement for complex diagrams requiring high detail
Review generated images against scientific accuracy before publication
anti_patterns: Using vague descriptions like 'make a neural network' without specifying architecture details
Expecting perfect diagrams in one iteration for complex scientific visualizations
Ignoring the quality score and review feedback for publication-critical figures
Generating diagrams without verifying scientific accuracy of relationships and notation

faq.question: What AI models are used?
faq.answer: Uses Nano Banana Pro for image generation and Gemini 3 Pro for quality review via OpenRouter API.

faq.question: What diagram types are supported?
faq.answer: Neural networks, biological pathways, flowcharts, system architectures, circuits, and block diagrams.

faq.question: How does smart iteration work?
faq.answer: Only regenerates if quality score is below threshold. First generation that meets threshold stops early.

faq.question: Is my data safe?
faq.answer: API calls send prompts to OpenRouter. No data is stored or shared beyond completing the generation request.

faq.question: Why did generation fail?
faq.answer: Check OPENROUTER_API_KEY is set. Verify internet connection. Ensure output path is writable.

faq.question: How is this different from other diagram tools?
faq.answer: Combines AI generation with automatic quality review. Smart iteration saves API calls when quality threshold is met.
